overview:
TangÃ­vel provides usability services - support, guidance, and interface design for web, PC and mobile applications.

They aim to help software users and companies to produce user-centered applications for effectively support the user productivity and subjective satisfaction, with intuitive, easily learning, interactively robust, and professional look & feel, user interfaces.

Products and Services:

  • User Profiling: characterization of the application’s users;
  • Task Analysis: identification, characterization and interrelation of the users’ tasks in their work environment;
  • Rapid Prototyping: low-fidelity, low-cost, high-flexibility and iterative user interface testing;
  • Heuristic Evaluation: expert evaluation of user interfaces against well-know human-computer interaction standards, and recommendations of solutions;
  • User Testing: user testing of applications and websites with video recording and special tool for analysis;
  • Quantitative Analysis: usability assessment against usability metrics, and proposals for optimization;
  • Accessibility Evaluation Guidelines: evaluation and recommendations about accessibility standards for user with special needs;
  • Competitive Analysis: usability analysis of competitive products and services;
  • Visual Design: graphic user-interfaces design with professional look & feel;
  • Visual Styleguides: styleguides and guidelines of user-interface focussed on implementation concerns;
  • Help and Documentation: application help and documentation design and testing, for efficient help usage;
